heatwave3 0.0.3

heatwave3: Detect Heatwaves and Cold-Spells within cubed data

Source: R/heatwave3-package.R
heatwave3-package.Rd

This package is an extension to heatwaveR that allows the user to detect extreme events a la Hobday definition directly on cubed data files (e.g. NetCDF format).

See also

Useful links:

  • https://robwschlegel.github.io/heatwave3/index.html

  • https://github.com/robwschlegel/heatwave3
